"Power Level Part 1":
"\"Power Level\" is a way to quantify a player's combat ability based on their status and their equipment.

Before you can participate in some quests or enter some areas, you must meet their minimum Power Level requirement."

"There are a number of ways to increase your Power Level:

・Raise your level by fighting battles and clearing Side Tasks
・Learn Main Class/Sub Class Class Skills
・Equip stronger weapons and armor, and Grind the ones you're using
・Add Special Abilities to your weapon and armor
・Release your weapon's Potential"
